name: Automonious
tag_list: car, cars, auto, autos, automotive, vehicle, vehicles, perfect-car, dream-car, car-match, auto-match, car-shopping, car-research
description: The future of internet car shopping
overview:
Automonious will change the way people shop for cars. The average consumer spends over 10 hours researching before going into the dealer’s showroom. Automonious can give them a better match in 10 minutes.

The Automonious algorithm matches users with the car that’s right for them, their Automotive Soul Mate, on both functional needs and personality (theirs and the car’s).
